description: Blockchain Expert & Educator Specializing in DeFi and Decentralized Technologies
about_work:
In the evolving landscape of blockchain and decentralized finance (DeFi), my passion and expertise lie in education and innovation. As an educator at ESILv, I have the privilege of guiding the next generation of blockchain professionals, teaching courses on DeFi and decentralized technologies. This role has allowed me to merge my deep technical knowledge with a strong commitment to empowering students with the skills and understanding needed to navigate and shape the future of finance and technology.

My journey in the blockchain space has been characterized by a strong foundation in technical skills and a commitment to contributing to the community. With a Master's degree in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence from Leonard de Vinci Graduate School of Engineering, my academic background has provided me with a solid base to explore the intersections of AI and blockchain technologies.

Beyond my academic endeavors, my engagement with the blockchain community through KRYPTOSPHERE¬Æ has been particularly rewarding. As a Decentralized Finance Expert and board member, I have analyzed over 20 DeFi projects, assessing opportunities, risks, project governance, and tokenomics. This role emphasizes my dedication to not only staying at the forefront of blockchain technology developments but also sharing that knowledge through weekly talks and as a KRYPTOSPHERE¬Æ MOOC redactor.

While I previously co-founded OmniShape, a hybrid sports app leveraging both Web2 and Web3 technologies, my current focus is on the transformative potential of blockchain in finance and education. Through personal projects, including the development of automated crypto wallet reports and backend interfaces for critical societal functions, I continually explore the practical applications of blockchain to solve real-world problems.

Fluent in French, I am a proactive educator, innovator, and leader in the blockchain community, eager to contribute my knowledge and skills to projects that seek to harness the power of blockchain for societal and financial empowerment.
title: Web3 blockchain developer
